faq_a1: MonkeyZ is a premium e-commerce platform offering unique products and services with fast, reliable delivery.
faq_q2: How do I place an order?
faq_a2: Browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can pay securely online.
faq_a3: We accept all major credit cards and secure online payment methods.
faq_a4: Visit our Contact page or email support@monkeyz.co.il for assistance.
faq_a5: Yes! After placing an order, you’ll receive a tracking link via email.
about_intro: Welcome to <1>MonkeyZ</1>! We are passionate about providing the best digital products and customer experience.
about_mission: To deliver high-quality, affordable digital products with fast support and a seamless shopping experience. We believe in transparency, trust, and putting our customers first.
about_why1: Exclusive digital deals and software keys
about_why4: Trusted by thousands of happy customers
about_team: MonkeyZ is powered by a small, dedicated team of tech enthusiasts and customer service pros. We love what we do and it shows in every order!
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
blog_meta_description: Read the latest posts from the MonkeyZ blog.
blog_subheader: News, updates, and thoughts from the MonkeyZ team.
blog_no_posts: No posts to display yet. Check back soon!
all_products_meta_description: Browse all MonkeyZ products. Find the best digital products and services for your needs.
protected_by_recaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the
privacy_info_collection_text: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including:
privacy_personal_info: Personal information such as name, email address, and payment details.
privacy_usage_info: Usage information about how you interact with our website.
privacy_transaction_info: Transaction information about purchases made on our site.
privacy_technical_info: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, and operating system.
privacy_usage_text: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
privacy_usage_improve: To improve our website and services.
privacy_usage_communicate: To communicate with you about your orders and account.
privacy_usage_process: To process transactions and send related information.
privacy_usage_security: To protect our website and users from security threats.
privacy_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share certain information with trusted service providers who help us operate our business.
privacy_cookies_text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacy_security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy_rights_text: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your data.
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at
privacy_policy_meta_description: Privacy Policy for MonkeyZ - Learn how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
terms_acceptance_text: By accessing or using the MonkeyZ website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms_accounts_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
terms_accounts_accuracy: Maintaining the accuracy of your account information.
terms_accounts_responsibility: All activity that occurs under your account.
terms_products_text: All products and services are subject to availability. We reserve the right to modify, discontinue, or add products without notice.
terms_payment_text: By providing payment information, you represent that you are authorized to use the payment method. We use third-party payment processors to secure your payment information.
terms_refund_text: Digital products may be refundable within 14 days of purchase if the product has not been activated or downloaded. Please contact our support team for assistance with refunds.
terms_intellectual_property_text: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of MonkeyZ and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms_prohibited_text: You agree not to use our website for:
terms_prohibited_illegal: Any illegal purposes or to violate any laws.
terms_prohibited_harm: Harming or attempting to harm other users.
terms_prohibited_data: Collecting data from the website for any competitive purpose.
terms_liability_text: MonkeyZ shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our products or services.
terms_contact_text: If you have any questions about our Terms of Service, please contact us at
terms_meta_description: Terms of Service for MonkeyZ - Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
product_meta_description: Explore our quality products at MonkeyZ.
contact_subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form below to get in touch.
